description: This file defines error handling utilities for a FastAPI web application. It includes an error response schema, functions for extracting request IDs from headers, and exception handlers to return standardized JSON error responses for HTTP exceptions and unhandled errors.

classes.name: ErrorResponse
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a standardized error response payload.

methods.name: _request_id_from_headers
methods.description: Extracts a request ID or correlation ID from the request headers.

methods.name: install_exception_handlers
methods.description: Sets up global exception handlers for HTTPException and unhandled exceptions, returning JSON error responses.
